Matt Henning

UX Researcher, Web Designer, & Developer


I am a second year student at the University of Michigan-Ann Arbor School of Information studying UX, HCI, and social computing. I graduated with my bachelors from UM as well in Film, Television & Media, with a minor in Community Action & Social Change through the School of Social Work. Over the years I have intentionally engaged in both academic communities, and creative spaces which has developed my passion for creative scholarship, and intentional impact. I specifically see myself innovating at the intersection of art, scholarship, research, theory, UX, and idea production through an integrated creative and research-based practice.
